shortDescription.intro: Replaces missing values with the average of surrounding cells.

fullDescription.p:
Calculates the mean of all values that are within the window given by the lookahead and lookbehind and replaces missing values with this mean.
This missing value handler does not produce standard PMML 4.2!
fullDescription.option: The number of cells to take into account before the current cell.
The number of cells to take into account after the current cell.
